ValidationRule.description: When hiring is from another state Dept, Dividsion/Dept field is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( (NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator'))), (
(ISPICKVAL(Hiring_Type__c, "Transfer from other Dept")) && ( ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A01-Permanent Appointment from List") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A01-CEA appointment from list") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A01-Limited Term from List") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A01-Student Assistant") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A01-Graduate Student Assistant") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A01-Youth Aid") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A01-TAU in Lieu of Limited Term") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A01-TAU in Lieu of Permanent Appointment") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A02-Reinstatement (permissive)") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A02-Emergency") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A02-Retired Annuitant") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A02-Transfer") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A04-Training & Development") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A30/A31-Exempt") || ISPICKVAL( Type__c , "A14 - Adverse Demotion") ) && ISPICKVAL(Transferred_from_Division_or_Dept__c,'') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide "Transferred from Division or Dept" information.
